 2013-09702013-09-27,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActCustoms Tariff
SubjectOrder Amending the Outward Processing Remission Order (Textiles and Apparel)
PrecisOrder Amending the OUTWARD PROCESSING REMISSION ORDER (TEXTILES AND APPAREL) in order for Canadian importers to benefit from reduced rates of duty when importing apparel produced in a General Preferential Tariff country when that apparel is made from Canadian textiles, effective January 1, 2015.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0164 Publication Date: 2013-10-09
AttachmentsAttachment
